set terminal postscript eps enhanced
set output 'step-conv800-2.eps'
set size 0.7, 0.7
set logscale y
set logscale x
set grid
set xlabel 'Degrees of Freedom'
set ylabel 'Relative L_2 error [%]'
plot [4000:200000][0.0008:1] '-' w l linetype 1 linewidth 3 title 'hp-FEM', '-' w l linetype 2 linewidth 3 title 'h-FEM'
